ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلطُّورِ
ayahs.translation: By the mount

ayahs.text: وَكِتَٰبٍۢ مَّسْطُورٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed

ayahs.text: فِى رَقٍّۢ مَّنشُورٍۢ
ayahs.translation: In parchment spread open

ayahs.text: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
ayahs.translation: And [by] the frequented House

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
ayahs.translation: And [by] the heaven raised high

ayahs.text: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
ayahs.translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

ayahs.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

ayahs.text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Of it there is no preventer.

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

ayahs.text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

ayahs.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍۢ يَلْعَبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
ayahs.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

ayahs.text: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

ayahs.text: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

ayahs.text: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَنَعِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

ayahs.text: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

ayahs.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

ayahs.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مَّصْفُوفَةٍۢ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

ayahs.text: وَأَمْدَدْنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ وَلَحْمٍۢ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
ayahs.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

ayahs.text: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا لَّا لَغْوٌۭ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

ayahs.text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌۭ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ
ayahs.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

ayahs.text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

ayahs.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

ayahs.text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayahs.translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

ayahs.text: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍۢ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
ayahs.translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

ayahs.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌۭ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
ayahs.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

ayahs.text: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
ayahs.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

ayahs.text: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

ayahs.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

ayahs.text: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍۢ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

ayahs.text: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِقُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

ayahs.text: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

ayahs.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

ayahs.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌۭ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

ayahs.text: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

ayahs.text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًۭا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍۢ مُّثْقَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

ayahs.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

ayahs.text: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

ayahs.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayahs.translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

ayahs.text: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًۭا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌۭ مَّرْكُومٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

ayahs.text: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
ayahs.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًۭا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

ayahs.text: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
ayahs.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

ayahs.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
ayahs.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
